entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Westlock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:08 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches becoming fog late this evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Fog. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Fog dissipating near noon then cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 10. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 2. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 6:05 PM MST Monday 16 January 2023
